Name: PvZ2_Prepreprelease_FF_P8

Updates.en: Added Red Stinger, Apple Mortar (slightly icreased their damage)
Updates.zh: 加入红针花、苹果迫击炮

Updates.en: Allowed players to preview the lawn when choosing their seeds
Updates.zh: 选择植物时允许玩家提前观察草坪

Updates.en: Allow players to use Classic Card Background through a toggle in Settings
Updates.zh: 可以在设置界面选择使用经典卡槽背景

NewFeatures: 加入红针花、苹果迫击炮
选择植物时允许玩家提前观察草坪
可以在设置界面选择使用经典卡槽背景
EnNewFeatures: Added Red Stinger, Apple Mortar (slightly icreased their damage)
Allowed players to preview the lawn when choosing their seeds
Allowed players to use Classic Card Background through a toggle in Settings
